Articles.Content:
Hi all. Just a quick question.  I've got facetracknoir on my laptop and was wondering if it will work with KSP in IVA. I can't seem to get it working however I'm a noob at this. Any help appreciated

Edit.  I've installed kerbtrack and I can get to the settings when I pause but no head movement in game....facetracknoir is working...Web Cam on....if I quit KSP the facetracknoir interface sees my head and moves as it should...

Edited January 28, 2017 by maceemiller
well ive tried everything to make Kerb Track work and spent countless hours searching on the internet and it will not work with KSP. Works on other games so im guessing its outdated now for KSP

You might want to put in a feedback on the bugtracker, asking Squad to implement support for this thing. I know that there are some controllers that Squad has added specific support for. I would hope that at some point there is some generic solution that can come close to supporting everything -- but unfortunately I don't know any more about the subject than that.

8 hours ago, bewing said:

You might want to put in a feedback on the bugtracker, asking Squad to implement support for this thing. I know that there are some controllers that Squad has added specific support for. I would hope that at some point there is some generic solution that can come close to supporting everything -- but unfortunately I don't know any more about the subject than that.

Thankyou for your reply. Odd thing is I know others have stated they already use it. Kerb track has been updated to 1.2 so maybe it's just me. Not sure it is though as I'm fairly computer savvy and I did everything to the letter. Never mind

If others have said they got it working, then that is an excellent reason to send several of them a private message asking for details and extra help.  (You should mention what you tried that didn't work.)

22 hours ago, bewing said:

If others have said they got it working, then that is an excellent reason to send several of them a private message asking for details and extra help.  (You should mention what you tried that didn't work.)

I have sent messages but no replies. It's not a problem. I'll just have to accept it will not work.
